component.name: BinauralPlayer
component.summary: Full-featured media player with brainwave audio generation

description.p: BinauralPlayer is a powerful media player that combines traditional media playback with brainwave audio generation. Users can enjoy tabbed playlists, advanced playback controls, and immersive brainwave sessions with binaural beats or isochronic tones.

ul.li: Multi-format support: MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, M4A, MP4, M4V, AVI, MKV
Tabbed playlists: Create, rename, and manage multiple playlists
Advanced playback: Shuffle, repeat, seek, volume control with mute
Streaming support: Play audio from HTTP/HTTPS URLs
Time display: Track position/duration with seekable progress bar
Three modes: Binaural Beats, Isochronic Tones, Audio Generator
Real-time dynamic engine: Immediate parameter changes
Waveforms: Sine, Square, Triangle, Sawtooth
Frequency control: Left/right channels (20Hzâ€“20kHz)
Auto-stop timer with countdown visualization
Tabbed interface with multiple named playlists
Search function to filter tracks
Save/load playlists in JSON
Track operations: Add, remove, clear with selection tracking
Custom toolbars: Media (Blue), Binaural (Purple), Nature (Green)
Split status bar for media and brainwave engine status
Icon set with 291 SVG icons
Responsive layout with graceful resizing
Safety warnings on first launch and brainwave activation
